name: Tale of Time
description:
[Game is in german, but can be played when you dont know german]

Quinn has a gift - she can stop time.  Since she was a little kid, doctors have doon experiments with her to find out how to make use of her ability. But she had enough of it. She was finally able to escape and now is stuck in a dungeon. Can you help her to find a way out?

This is only a prototype so it only has a tutorial-level
